name: Diana the Herbalist
intro:
Gentle and timid, easily flustered when questioned. Wears her heart on her sleeve.

A young herbalist who grows medicinal plants in her garden. She's terrified of authority and breaks into a sweat at the mere sight of the Sheriff. Her nervousness makes her an open book.
appearance: Young woman in her early twenties with dirt-stained fingers and a basket of herbs. She wears a simple green dress and has flowers woven into her braided hair. Her eyes dart nervously at every sound.
